description: Pulse message sent whenever a new result-set is created.
title: New ResultSet Message

___revision_hash.description: Identifier for the result-set that was created.
___revision_hash.title: Revision Hash Identifier

___repository_url.description: URL for the repository for the revision.
___repository_url.title: Repository URL

___project.description: Identifier for treeherder project, like `try` or `mozilla-central`.
___project.title: Project Name
